name: OIL SPRITZER
description:
This moisturizing spritz... ideal for those with fine hair or those who just prefer a lighter alternative to thick butters. Additionally, it may be used to revive twists or another style that has gotten dry over time. Can also be used for hot oil treatment under a heating cap then rinse with cold water.... Which gives excellent results!!! 
THIS 8oz CONTAINS:
Water
Jojoba oil
Rosemary oil
Coconut oil 
Olive oil
Almond oil
Avocado oil 
Vegetable glycerin
Vitamin E oil
Neem oil 


///note/// 
-Refrigeration may extend the shelf life a bit-

name: CURL DEFINING PUDDING
description:
8oz. Ofmoisture-rich curling pudding for defining curls. Transforms frizzy dull curls into bouncy healthy-looking curls. Pudding can be used for various styles from twist-out, bantu knots, finger coiling and more.
Contains:
Aloe Vera gel
Raw Shea butter
Jojoba oil
Rosemary oil
Tea tree oil
Coconut oil
Olive oil
Almond oil
Grape seed oil
Avocado oil
Vitamin oil

name: MOISTURIZING SHAMPOO
description: Chemical free shampoo Shampoo with natural ingredients for dry hair that gently cleanses and provides lightweight moisture to leave hair nourished, airy and shiny. Sulfate free, paraben free and alcohol free and phthalene Free

name: WHIPPED SHEA BUTTER
description:
This multi-purpose whipped Shea butter has over 15 organic natural oils, 5 essential oils, and herbs. Best of the best. 
Vegan and Cruelty Free,
Sulfate Free, phthalene Free, Silicone Free and
No Mineral oil 100% natural . Great for hair and body. A little goes a long way. 

KEY INGREDIENTS:
Shea butter, jojoba oil, apricot kernel oil, avocado, sweet almond oil, castor oil, olive oil, rosemary oil, grape-seed oil , nettles and more!!!
